name: Command
description: You command a minion or grunt within a short (10 unit) distance to take an action by making a presence check against their resilience. The command becomes invalid at the start of your next turn. You can force them to fall (go prone), halt (0 movement speed), drop (unequip a piece of equipment or drop an object) or any other command that does not directly cause them to harm themselves or an ally.
charge: This spell can be used against standard tiered creatures.
